ygData.subject: Re: Bardic guild on Tunare
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/19/99 3:55:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time, bean@escape.ca writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/19/99 3:55:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time, bean@...
writes:

<< Sure I see a lot of the names, but you never hear about
them recruiting, or holding events, etc. The Sisterhood was the only guild
I've ever seen to hold an event. Maybe Tunare is just a bad server for such
things. <shrug> >>

I play on Tunare , and it is true there aren't many events on the server. But
I do get invited into guilds all the time. Just group with someone, ask them
how they like their guild. Just start a casual conversation with them while
grouping. If you are a good bard , and they like how you do things. you'll
get invited . Usually at the end of the night i'll get a tell from someone i
don't even know ( the leader of the guild ) asking me to join. Many of the
guilds are well established so they don't actively go out and recruit , but
that doesn't mean they won't take more members. and besides every guild needs
as many bards as they can get ) BtW feel free to look me up on Tunare if you
ever need help or anything.

Ulaien Firesong
Lvl 40 bard of tunare
